com.selesse.jxlint.model

Class ProgramOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.selesse.jxlint.model.ProgramOptions

  • public class ProgramOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    jxlint program options. This contains information relating to JxlintOptions. It is a Map of JxlintOptions to Strings.

      • getRuleListFromOptionString

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRuleListFromOptionString(java.lang.String optionString)
                                                                    throws NonExistentLintRuleException
        Returns a list of strings from the raw option string. In other words, given a raw option string "Rule1, Rule2" (i.e. parsed from --disable "Rule1, Rule2"), this returns a list with { "Rule1", "Rule2" }. If any of the rules passed as strings do not exist, this will function will throw a NonExistentLintRuleException.
        Throws:
        NonExistentLintRuleException

      • getCategoryListFromOptionString
